1.description: Upgrade PaperCut to the latest version.

2.command: Block inbound traffic to web management portal
2.description: Block all inbound traffic from external IP addresses to the web management portal (port 9191 and 9192 by default).

3.command: Block all traffic to web management portal
3.description: Block all traffic inbound to the web management portal. Note: The server cannot be managed remotely after this step.

4.description: Create a backup of the current PaperCut server(s).

5.description: Wipe the PaperCut Application Server and/or Site Server and rebuild it.

6.description: Restore the database from a 'safe' backup point. Using a backup dated prior to April 2023 would be prudent.

7.description: Execute additional security response procedures and carry out best practices around potential compromise.

8.description: Report the compromise to CISA via CISAâ€™s 24/7 Operations Center (report@cisa.gov or 888-282-0870).
